# Renegades
Renegades are allowed to rob anyone as long as they follow rule 6. When robbing people they should only take a percentage of the gear they have with the leader being able to take more gear, even less than Bandits as you have the option to pull teeth. However, someone who resists is fair game to be looted completely, if you can catch them that is. Renegades caught robbing someone are allowed to be killed by whoever caught them.
Wars: - Government (Military, Military Stalkers, Scientists, ETC) - Militia
